title: 9.3 Master Challenge 1
question: Create a Bank class that will act as a superclass. Add at least three data members, like bankName,location , and so on, and methods to deposit and withdraw money. Next, create a subclass called OnlineBank that includes additional features such as online transfer. Use appropriate methods and constructors in both classes. Create a Bank reference and assign it an object of type OnlineBank. Use this reference to call methods and explain what happens.
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - scratch - javascript - R - pseudocode - java
